trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 호스트 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn 클래스는 특수 한 유형의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>이진 상태를 나타내는 호스트 셀 논리적으로 하는 데 사용 되는 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn에는 연결 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>과 교차 하는 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 비슷한 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)를 제공 하는 각 셀을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 이 열 형식에 대 한 기본 정렬 모드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 확인란 셀 값은 다른 데이터를 저장 하거나 대량 작업을 수행 하기 위한 용도로 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 수 사용자가 확인란 셀을 클릭 하면 바로 대응 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트, 하지만이 이벤트는 셀 값이 업데이트 되기 전에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: 한 가지 옵션은 됩니다 예상 값을 계산 하 고 클릭 시 새 값이 필요한 경우 현재 값을 기반으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: 즉시는 변경 내용을 커밋하고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>응답 하는 이벤트</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> 를 처리 하는 또 다른 방법은

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 셀을 클릭할 때의 변경 내용을 커밋하지를 처리 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: 처리기에서 확인란 셀 현재 셀을 사용 하는 경우 호출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드와 전달은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"> </xref> 클래스를 기본 상태로 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 인수를 제공 하는이 기본 생성자를 사용 하 여 `false` 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>생성자.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"> </xref> 확인란이 두 개 또는 세 개의 상태를 표시 하도록 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 다음 속성을 설정 하 여 열을 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|The value of the `threeState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>속성이으로 초기화 된 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>는 `threeState` 매개 변수 값입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>| 값은 `threeState` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성에서 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>속성입니다. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성에서 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>속성입니다. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>세 개의 상태가; 있는 확인란을 표시 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 확인란이 두 개의 상태와 표시 되도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 새 셀을 만드는 데 사용 되는 템플릿을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>새로 만든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> 이 속성을 초기화 하는 클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> 에 대 한 생성자

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 셀 서식 파일의 속성 변경 즉시 영향을 주지 것입니다 열의 기존 셀의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI).

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 열 다시 생성 한 후 이러한 변경 된 것만 (예를 들어 열 정렬 이나 호출을 통해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> 있는 다른 열의 모든 셀에는 다음에 모델링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 다른 형식의 값으로 속성은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 열의 기본 셀 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 반환 되는 기본 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>초기 속성 값은 다음과 같습니다: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 속성 | 기본 값 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>| 초기 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>속성 값이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> `true`, 그렇지 않으면 `false`. | 이러한 값에 지정 된 값을 재정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>컨트롤과 같지만 다른 셀 스타일 속성에 의해 재정의 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 셀 스타일](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>DefaultCellStyle 속성에서 반환 되는 개체의 속성의 값은 `false`로 변경 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>속성 값을 `true` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> 로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> 자동 설정</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>변경는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>속성 값을 `false` 를 자동으로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>를 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 기본 스타일으로 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: 셀 값에 해당 내부 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 선택 되지 않은 상자로로 나타나는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: FalseValue <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>속성 기본 데이터 원본에 나타나는 순서 대로 이러한 상태 중 연결 된 값을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>반환 되는 셀 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>이 열의 셀에에서는으로 취급 하는 값을 나타내는 한 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 값.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: 확인란 셀의 평면 스타일 모양을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 스타일을 사용 하 여 확인란 셀을 표시 하려면이 속성을 설정 하 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 하기 전에 메서드</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>반환 되는 셀 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> 열에서 셀의 모양을 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 결정 되지 않은 내부 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 셀 비활성화 된 확인란으로 표시 되는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and IndeterminateValue properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, IndeterminateValue 속성 기본 데이터 원본에 나타나는 순서 대로 이러한 상태 중 연결 된 값을 결정 하 고.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>반환 되는 셀 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>이 열의 셀에에서는 결정 되지 않은 값으로 취급 하는 값을 나타내는.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지가 아닌 세 가지 선택 상태 호스팅된 확인란 셀 허용 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box.
trans-unit.target: 비활성화 상태 유용할 수 있습니다, 예를 들어, 확인란에 기본값을 설정 하지 않을 때.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>반환 되는 셀 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the ThreeState property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>반환 되는 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>속성의 값은 `false`, ThreeState 속성 값을 변경 `true` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> 로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> 자동 설정</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the ThreeState property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, ThreeState 속성 값을 변경 `false` 를 자동으로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>를 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우 호스팅된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> 개체는 세 번째, 비활성화, 상태를 사용할 수 없으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 열을 설명 하는 문자열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>열을 설명 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: 셀 값에 해당 내부 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 선택 된 상자로 나타나는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>속성 기본 데이터 원본에 나타나는 순서 대로 이러한 상태 중 연결 된 값을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하거나 가져옵니다 가져오거나이 속성을 설정 하는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>반환 되는 셀 개체의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 집합에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>속성 새로 고침 및 열에 있는 모든 셀의 열을 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 셀에 대해 지정된 된 값을 재정의 하려면 열 값을 설정 하면 셀 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cell will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>값으로 처리 될 셀을 나타내는 한 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 값.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.
